Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Circumcision:

Text.Language: Yel/l m~mwten m~voou: nieynoc t/rou qen ourasi: je P,#c# afswp e~rof: m~picebi e~h~r/i e~jwn.
Rejoice today with joy / all you nations / for Christ accepted to Himself / the circumcision on our behalf.
